thread.title: Top DOJ Official Criticizes Baltimore for Police, Prosecution Pullback

author: Scott Calvert
title: Top DOJ Official Criticizes Baltimore for Police, Prosecution Pullback
text:
Baltimore’s record-high homicide rate—one of the highest in the U.S.—is tied to decisions in 2015 by local authorities to “cut back” on policing and prosecution, U.S. Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein said Monday
During Mr. Rosenstein’s tenure as Maryland’s top federal prosecutor, local, state and federal authorities jointly targeted gangs and secured long prison terms for armed criminals, he said during a speech at a meeting of the American Correctional Association in Orlando, Fla. He credited that strategy for keeping...
